overview: Sweet Home Alabama, 1986: Burton has had a bad day, and things are about to get a hell of a lot worse. After loosing his job and finding his wife cheating on him with his best friend, Burton begins spending his days and nights at the local bar. His drunken exploits eventually lead him down a dangerous road of sex, cults and murder. With a special appearance by Kyle Holman, "Golden Age" is not just a movie.
title: Golden Age
